title: Which chapters in chemistry and physics of both classes 11 and 12 have more weightage in the NEET? - Quora

response.answer_text: For NEET important and scoring chapters are- Physics (11th -12th):- 1.thermodyanmics 2.SHM and wave 3.morden physics 4.electrostatics 5.gravitaions 6.kinemetics 7.optics Chemistry 11th - 1.themodyanmics 2.chemical bonding 3.structure of atoms 4.p and s-blocks 5.organic 12th(all chapters are important).
